survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the satisfaction and experience of freelancers using online platforms to find work, manage projects, and interact with clients.

questions.question_text: Which freelance platform do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include a follow-up open-ended question if 'Other' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input.

script.question_text: Which freelance platform do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience on your primary freelance platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for standardized responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience on your primary freelance platform?

questions.question_text: What is the primary type of work you seek on freelance platforms?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for niche categories.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with optional text input.

script.question_text: What is the primary type of work you seek on freelance platforms?

questions.question_text: How often do you secure projects on your primary platform?
questions.client_notes: Assess frequency to gauge platform effectiveness.

script.question_text: How often do you secure projects on your primary platform?

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using freelance platforms? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to capture multiple pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice with optional text input.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using freelance platforms? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the platform's customer support responsiveness?

script.question_text: How would you rate the platform's customer support responsiveness?

questions.question_text: Do you use any additional tools or apps to manage your freelance work? (e.g., Trello, Slack, invoicing software)
questions.client_notes: Follow up with open-ended questions if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice with conditional routing.

script.question_text: Do you use any additional tools or apps to manage your freelance work? (e.g., Trello, Slack, invoicing software)

questions.question_text: If yes, please list the tools or apps you use.
questions.routing_logic: Only if Q7 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with conditional display.

script.question_text: If yes, please list the tools or apps you use.
script.routing_logic: Only if Q7 is answered with 'Yes'

questions.question_text: How important are these platform features to you? (Rate each on a scale of 1-5, where 1 = Not important, 5 = Very important)
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice grid with a 5-point scale for each item.

script.question_text: How important are these platform features to you? (Rate each on a scale of 1-5, where 1 = Not important, 5 = Very important)

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your primary freelance platform to other freelancers?
questions.client_notes: Simple recommendation question to gauge loyalty.
